name: Login with email containing space
description: Verify the system's response to an email address containing a space.
steps: Step 1: Enter 'test @example.com' (with a space) into the 'Username or email address' field.
Step 2: Enter any password into the 'Password' field.
expected_results: Expected result 1: An error message should appear indicating an invalid email format.

elements.description: Username or email address input field
